input.sentences: vacationing here is really awesome . beautiful sea water .
the beaches is beautiful also . breeze feels good .
family decided to take photos of different sites for memories .
beautiful picture of sea rolling in with different shells landing on island .

output.sentences: I love to vacation at the sea.
It even feels beautiful with its warm breezes.
There are awesome sites perfect for taking photos and collecting memories.
I love the simple pleasures of rolling tides and sea shells.
At midnight the water seems to merge with the sky.
